form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To require that certain standards for commercial driver’s licenses applicable to former members of the armed services or reserves also apply to current members of the armed services or reserves.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Active Duty Voluntary Acquisition of Necessary Credentials for Employment Act or the ADVANCE Act.

section.header: Commercial driver’s license standards for service members and veterans
section.text: Section 31305(d) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the subsection heading, by striking Veteran operators and inserting Service Members, Reservists, and Veterans;
in paragraph (1)(B), by striking subparagraph (A) during and inserting

clause.text: while serving in the armed forces or reserve components; and

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2)(B), by inserting current or before former each place the term appears.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives June 26, 2017.
